title: Michael Saylor has been removing 80 deep fake videos of himself daily
description:
MicroStrategy executive chairman Michael Saylor reveals his team takes down 80 scam videos featuring his likeness every day, but they keep coming back.

MicroStrategy executive chairman Michael Saylor reveals his team works to remove around 80 AI-generated fake videos of him daily — all of which tout some Bitcoin-related scam. 

In a Jan. 13 post on X, Saylor warned his 3.2 million X followers about the large swathe of deep fake videos found on YouTube, warning that “the scammers keep launching more.”

“There is no risk-free way to double your #bitcoin, and @MicroStrategy doesn't give away $BTC to those who scan a barcode,” he reiterated.

Read more

title: Ukraine’s AI Drones Revolutionize Warfare, Posing a Formidable Challenge to Russia
description: In a groundbreaking development that could reshape the course of the ongoing conflict, Ukraine has turned to artificial intelligence (AI) to enhance the capabilities of its drone fleet. The use of self-teaching targeting algorithms in nimble quadcopter drones has become a critical response to Russia’s deployment of electronic warfare (E.W.) equipment, threatening Ukraine’s drone operations. […]
